result.execSummary:
The defendant William F Cippola was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. William F Cippola

Firearms are to be released to Atty F Zievers for sale of said firearms; must submit to court and file, list of each firearm & serial number and name of purchaser.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Deft may not possess firearms.
Bond from 16CM982 applied to fine and costs in 15CM1484 per cour record. gb/nr
from Patricia Jindrich, Ph.D., LPC, SAC, NCC from Personal Insights.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State. Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Zievers. Clerk/H. Barnett. Victim present and addressed. Court imposes $50 fine plus costs; deft to pay $200 DNA surcharge, pay DV surcharge, bond applied to fine/costs, bond also applied from file 16CM982.
With Diane/Atty Zievers and by approval of Judge Wagner the SEH of 7/17/17 at 8:15am is rescheduled; reset to 8/10/17 at 11:00am.
With Atty Zievers and by approval of Judge Wagner the SEH of 6/27/17 at 1:15pm is rescheduled to 7/17/17 at 8:15am.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Zievers.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Zievers states the case is resolved, requests to adjourn sentencing to produce deft's counsellor.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  DNA sample ordered.  SEH  6/27/17 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.
With Diane/Atty Zievers who states that Atty Ziever and ADA Krejcarek discussed this with Judge Wagner, the time of the HE on 6/8/17 is changed from 10:30am to 8:15am.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  DE appeared with Atty Frederick Zievers.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case is not resolved; DE presently recovering from knee surgery and undergoing physical therapy.  Ludwig hearing 6/8/17 at 10:30.  JS 8/7/17 at 8:30.  JT 8/8/17 at 8:30.  Bond continued.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty F Zievers appeared on behalf of deft, who did not appear.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Zievers states the deft is in the hospital, just had surgery.  STC continued to 5/15/17 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Atty F Zievers appeared on behalf of deft, who did not appear.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Case set for jury selection.  Deft's appearance is excused.  Atty Zievers gives report on the deft's medical condition.  STC set for 3/15/17 at 8:15am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Zievers.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Zievers motion to suppress.  Testimony taken from:  KPD Officer Garry Paskiewicz.  Court denies motion to suppress for reasons set forth on the record.  JS remains set for 1/30/17 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.
Motion hearing on October 19, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Jury trial on January 31, 2017 at 09:00 am.
Jury selection on January 30, 2017 at 08:30 am.

With ADA Krejcarek, Diane/Atty Zievers and by approval of Judge Wagner the MH of 9/29/16 at 1:30pm is rescheduled, as the State was unable to re-subpoena the witness in time; reset to 10/19/16 at 3:30pm; the JS of 10/17/16 at 8:30am is reset to 1/30/17 at 8:30am.

With Diane/Atty Zeivers, ADA Krejcarek and by approval of Judge Wagner the MH of 9/26/16 at 2:30pm is reset to the time of the JSH on 9/29/16, but the time is changed from 1:15pm to 1:30pm; ADA Krejcarek will attempt to reserve witnesses.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Zievers.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  State's motion for joinder.  Atty Zievers agrees to joinder motion.  Court grants motion for joinder with 16CM982.  Bond continued.
Filed by Atty F Zievers.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F Zievers.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Case is not resolved.  MH set for 8/15/16 at 8:30am, JS is rescheduled from 8/15/16 at 8:30am to 10/17/16 at 8:30am, pick & go; JSH set for 9/29/16 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.
NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Atty F Zievers appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  JSH set over to 7/29/16 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.
From DA regarding additional Discovery
State's list of witnesses and demand for discovery.

State's proposed.
State's notice of motion and motion for joinder; filed by ADA Rosamaria Delgado.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney F. Zievers.  Clerk/S. Garcia.  Case is not resolved.  Jury status 7/28/16 @ 1:15.  Jury selection 8/15/16 @ 8:30.  Bond continued.
From D.A.:  Reply/Answer to Defendant's Discovery Demand/State's Reciprocal Demand ADA R Delgado.
to withdraw; Atty E Bierma is permitte to withdraw from this action.
Atty F Zievers for deft.
from Atty F Zievers.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Atty E Bierma appeared on behalf of deft, who did not appear.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Bierma states she received a message from deft that he is recovering after being in the hospital.  FPT continued to 5/25/16 at 1:30pm.  Bond continued.

With Atty Bierma's office and by agreement of ADA Delgado the FPT of 2/10/16 at 1:30pm is rescheduled, as the deft is looking into treatment options and is in the process of relocating; reset to 4/12/16 at 1:15pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Modified bond signed.
